common.title: Silo - Multi-model chat, text-to-image
common.apply_to_all_tooltip: Different models may support different parameters or valid ranges, and will try to apply the current configuration to other models as much as possible
common.experience_key_title: You are using an experience key
common.experience_key_content: The experience key may trigger speed limits due to multiple use, it is recommended that you timely replace it with your own key.
common.confirm_clear_all_dialog: Are you sure you want to clear all conversations?
common.name: Name

system_prompt.avatar_help: Default to using the Vercel Avatar service, {random background}.svg?text={text}, adding a space before the text can adjust the spacing. Of course, you can also directly use the icon URL. For example, you can generate an icon using the text-to-image feature on this site and use its URL.

header.contact_developer_content: You can contact the developer directly via email or WeChat

popup.intro1: This site provides multi-model chat and text-to-image capabilities mainly based on SiliconCloud API, you need to register a SiliconCloud account first
popup.free_credit: and the official will also gift a 14 yuan credit for experiencing the paid model.
popup.have_account: If you already have an account, you can use
popup.get_siliconcloud_key: click here to get the SiliconCloud key
popup.key_storage_notice: Your key will only be stored in the browser, please use this app only on a secure device
popup.use_experience_key: Don't register yet, let me use your
popup.experience_key_warning: The experience key is not applicable to the paid model. It may also be further disabled due to the risk of abuse arising from its public nature.

zen_mode_tip.title: Zen Mode Enabled
zen_mode_tip.content: Move the mouse to the top of the page or press the Esc key to exit Zen Mode

ai_message.best_reply: AI voted as the best reply

chat.evaluate_prompt: The response to this question will be evaluated by AI

placeholder.go_out: Want to go out and play
placeholder.chat_topic: What do you want to talk about this time
placeholder.say_something: Do you have anything to say now
placeholder.rare_chat: I don't usually talk to humans, but you seem... tolerable
placeholder.nothing_to_say: Don't you have anything to say

options.image_width_desc: Set the width of vision model images, height adjusts automatically. Higher clarity takes more time and consumes more tokens
options.temperature_desc: Determines the randomness of the response. Higher values mean more randomness
options.top_p_desc: Another sampling method similar to Temperature. For example, 0.1 means only consider the top 10% of tokens with the highest probability. Not recommended to modify both Temperature and Top P at the same time
options.frequency_penalty_desc: Influences the likelihood of the model repeating the same word or phrase. Higher values mean less encouragement to repeat, with 0 having no effect on the model's behavior

config_import.title: Import Configuration
config_import.file_parsed: File parsed successfully. Page will refresh after confirming import.

custom_model.reload_notice: After custom model adjustment, the page will be automatically reloaded. Please ensure that the page data does not need to be processed
custom_model.select_placeholder: Modify the added model, or select a preset to import
custom_model.id_format_error: ID format error, please check if it conforms to: {manufacturer}/{model-name}, multiple need to be separated by English commas
custom_model.model_id_help: Format: {manufacturer}/{model-name}, multiple can be separated by English commas
custom_model.id_resolver_help: By default, the manufacturer part of the model ID will be removed and passed to the calling function. For example, `deepseek-ai/deepseek-coder` will be parsed as `deepseek-coder`. You can also customize the ID parsing function. For example, if you want to pass it directly to the interface, here can be filled in: `modelId => modelId`
custom_model.browser_extension_notice: Custom resolver is not supported in browser extensions
custom_model.resolver_placeholder: It is recommended to copy the debugged function here, no editor will be provided here
custom_model.icon_placeholder: Manufacturer Icon, optional. It is recommended to get it from HuggingFace
custom_model.details_link_placeholder: For example, the model url on HuggingFace

image_options.image_size_tooltip: Width and Height of Generated Images (pixels)
image_options.num_inference_steps_tooltip: Number of iterations for image generation. More steps usually produce better results but require longer processing time
image_options.batch_size_tooltip: Number of Images Generated at Once
image_options.guidance_scale_tooltip: Control the similarity of the generated image to the prompt. Higher values produce images closer to the prompt but may reduce overall quality
image_options.apply_to_all_tooltip: Different models may support different parameters or valid ranges, and will try to apply the current configuration to other models as much as possible
